item.title: Rules
item.description: To conduct the tournament in a professional manner, we will implement most of the FIBA 3X3 rules. Match Duration : 8 + 8 minutes (+2 mins OT) Running Clock. The game clock shall only be stopped during free throws. Match Format : 3v3 Timeouts : 2 Timeouts of 30 seconds/half A timeout may only be requested by the team players (Playing/Bench) when the ball is dead or in control of the team making the request.

item.title: Mvp Criteria
item.description: A cumulative normalised score would be calculated for each player based on the points, assists and rebounds.
